name: Devil's Island
description:
You are a mercenary whose task is to discover what happened on the island and where the first information about the apocalypse comes from. Zombie FPS survival set in a post-apocalyptic world in first-person mode with survival elements such as thirst and hunger, where every wrong step and race against time can lead to death.
What can you expect?
  • Development of basic character parameters
  • Crafting Items
  • Melee weapons and firearms
  • The climate of post-apocalyptic horror related to the messages of ancient civilizations about extraterrestrials.
  • Zombies
  • Survival in the wild among snakes, wolves, hunger, thirst and other adversities

  • And a lot more!!
Soon!!
